data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Log::Dispatch::Jabber allows a user to log messages via the
    Log::Dispatch framework, sending messages to one or more Jabber
    accounts.

    The paint on this package is still wet, but it does work.

    FWIW, I sent a note to the maintainer of the Log::Dispatch who said
    that he would be happy to see it uploaded to the CPAN.
